actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that for purposes of such title any individual who received a service-connected disability while serving on active duty, active duty for training, or inactive duty training in the armed forces shall be considered a disabled veteran.

summary.text: Redefines the term "disabled veteran" to include any individual who received a service-connected disability while serving on active duty, active duty for training, or inactive duty training in the Armed Forces, for purposes of preference eligibility in the Civil Service system.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that for purposes of such title any individual who received a service-connected disability while serving on active duty, active duty for training, or inactive duty training in the armed forces shall be considered a disabled veteran.
